mapper.select: SELECT uulo.id, uulo.userId, uulo.source, uulo.levelId,uule.level,uulo.createTime, uulo.vipExpireDate from uc_uvip_log uulo left join uc_uvip_level uule ON uulo.levelId = uule.levelCode where uulo.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createTime DESC
select count(1) from uc_user where vipLevel=#{levelCode}
